content: I've applied all of the agreed updates to the IG. There's still some work to do in the descriptions, but review of the profiles can start. Sorry this took so long. Some of the changes to the infrastructure resources broke things and it took a while to fix.
As a reminder, the current IG can be found here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-unified/
Ok, final updates applied to the descriptive content. Still some fixes that need to be made to address build errors, but those can be made after review.
